alert.note: Alert for Yellowstone National Park (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Teton County through 845 PM MDT... At 759 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southwest of South Entrance, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 35 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock small tree limbs. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Colter Bay Village around 815 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rain is also occurring with this storm. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
